content.content:
diff --git i/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubdev/us-east-1/plos/develop/plos-github-actions/iam.tf w/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubdev/us-east-1/plos/develop/plos-github-actions/iam.tf
index d4814f87c..dd88665c3 100644
--- i/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubdev/us-east-1/plos/develop/plos-github-actions/iam.tf
+++ w/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubdev/us-east-1/plos/develop/plos-github-actions/iam.tf
@@ -83,7 +83,10 @@ resource "aws_iam_policy" "github-actions-permissions" {
            {
             "Effect": "Allow",
             "Action": "lambda:*",
-            "Resource": "arn:aws:lambda:${local.aws_region}:${local.aws_account_id}:function:plos-*"
+            "Resource": [
+              "arn:aws:lambda:${local.aws_region}:${local.aws_account_id}:function:plos-*",
+              "arn:aws:lambda:${local.aws_region}:${local.aws_account_id}:function:catalyst-*"
+            ]
         }
     ],
     "Version": "2012-10-17"
diff --git i/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubprod/us-east-1/plos/prod/plos-github-actions/iam.tf w/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubprod/us-east-1/plos/prod/plos-github-actions/iam.tf
index d76621901..5f46681f5 100644
--- i/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubprod/us-east-1/plos/prod/plos-github-actions/iam.tf
+++ w/terraform/aws/omfsvcshubprod/us-east-1/plos/prod/plos-github-actions/iam.tf
@@ -79,7 +79,10 @@ resource "aws_iam_policy" "github-actions-permissions" {
            {
             "Effect": "Allow",
             "Action": "lambda:*",
-            "Resource": "arn:aws:lambda:${local.aws_region}:${local.aws_account_id}:function:plos-*"
+            "Resource": [
+              "arn:aws:lambda:${local.aws_region}:${local.aws_account_id}:function:plos-*",
+              "arn:aws:lambda:${local.aws_region}:${local.aws_account_id}:function:catalyst-*"
+            ]
         }
     ],
     "Version": "2012-10-17"
